terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.text:
Terms and Conditions
Welcome to our Patient Support Application ("App"). By using this App, you agree to the following terms and conditions. Please read them carefully.

1. Purpose of the App
This App is designed to support patients between psychotherapeutic sessions by providing guided exercises, reminders, journaling tools, mood tracking, and a conversational AI companion. The App may also allow your therapist to monitor your progress and provide feedback.

2. Not a Substitute for Medical Advice
The App is not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always seek advice from your qualified healthcare provider with any questions regarding a medical condition. Never disregard or delay seeking professional advice because of information provided by this App.

3. User Eligibility
This App is intended for use by patients receiving psychotherapeutic treatment and their therapists. By using this App, you confirm you are at least 18 years old or have consent from a legal guardian.

4. Privacy and Data Protection
Personal data and health-related information you enter in this App will be stored securely and only shared with your therapist as agreed.
You have control over what data is shared with your therapist. See our Privacy Policy for full details.
We anonymize data for research purposes where possible.

5. Use of AI and Chatbot
The AI chatbot is intended to support and motivate you, but may not always provide correct or appropriate information.
Do not rely solely on AI advice for critical decisions or emergencies.
All conversations may be logged for quality improvement and research, as described in the privacy policy.

6. User Responsibilities
You are responsible for the accuracy of the information you provide.
Do not use the App to harm yourself or others, or for any illegal activities.

7. Notifications and Reminders
The App can send notifications to remind you of therapy tasks, appointments, or healthy habits. You can manage notification settings in your profile.

8. Account and Security
Keep your login credentials confidential.
Notify us immediately if you suspect unauthorized access to your account.

9. Changes to the App and Terms
We may update or discontinue features at any time.
Terms may change; material changes will be communicated to you. Continued use means acceptance of the new terms.

10. Limitation of Liability
We do our best to provide a reliable App, but we cannot guarantee it will always be available, error-free, or meet your expectations. We are not liable for any damages arising from your use of the App.

11. Acceptance
By creating an account or using the App, you accept these Terms and Conditions.

onboarding.welcomeText: Let's get started with a few questions to personalize your experience.
onboarding.infoText_1: Let's work together toward better health.
onboarding.infoText_2: Lumina AI is here to support your well-being and guide you through personalized exercises.
onboarding.configuredTitle: Your coach already defined some things for you.
onboarding.configuredText: Lumina is personalized for your individual needs. You can talk to your coach to change it, and make adjustments throughout the app.
onboarding.languageSelection: What language would you like to use?
onboarding.termsText: In order to use our application, you need to agree to the terms of use and privacy policy. We do the best we can to protect your data. You can read the terms of use by clicking below.

questionnaires.title: Questionnaires
questionnaires.disclaimer: Disclaimer: These questionnaires support self-reflection but are not diagnostic tools. Please consult your coach for professional guidance.
questionnaires.selection: Which questionnaire/test do you want to complete?

GAD-7.title: GAD-7
GAD-7.description: Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems?
questions: Feeling nervous, anxious or on edge
Not being able to stop or control worrying
Worrying too much about different things
Being so restless that it is hard to sit still
Feeling afraid as if something awful might happen

footer.aiwarning: AI responses may be inaccurate. Verify important information.
